channel.title: Adding player commands and Removing commands
channel.description:
How would i be able to add a Starter Command and Remove a Mod Command.
For example i want ::starter to give 20M Gp & Whip to player only once and for mod i want to remove the ability to get passwords.
thanks.. im new at this so im a bit confused, looked at all the docs for my source and went crosseyed lol
also if its not too much trouble, what are the Item codes for all Skill capes with hoods.. i keep getting sources with glitches and dont give the cape to all players only a few. and players keep asking for the capes and ::pickup commands dont do 5 digits.. only 4 thanks

If you use it it proves you cannot code.

item.title: Adding player commands and Removing commands
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has recieved his starter pack, get you'rs by typing ::starter"; starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

Read full topic

getpassword part is removed thanks for that

still need help with adding commands… also shops would be good too lol or adding to shops
